Articles.Content:
I dock a rogue ship to your space station, which makes it spin uncontrollably, and moments later it explodes, releasing loads of tiny bits of debris to space.

My space debris.

I combine your debris with antimatter, turning it into pure energy

My energy.
I turn your energy into matter, in the space of a hill. My hill.

I compress your matter into a small black hole

My black hole.

I fill you black

my white fountain

I throw paint cans at it.

My rainbow fountain.

I throw a trout in it

My rainbow trout

I eat the trout.

My tasty meal.

I make you puke the trout.

My nasty trout.
I invade a hill. my hill, on a different planet in a different galaxy from everyone else.

I crash megatiger78's galaxy into windows\_x\_seven's galaxy to make room for my brand new house on the galactic hill

My house.
I escape back into the megaverse, causing it to change its form from me into a heavily armed space marine dreadnought.
Heavily armed, maybe, but you never mentioned defenses. One 800 terachocrane TCAW blast should do the trick.
You never claimed it. MY heavily damaged space marine!

/me hires duke nukem to take care of that doomed space marine.

My duke nukem
I upgrade the software. MY 1440p video game!
I upgrade the gameplay. My classic dos alien-ass-kicking duke nukem

REVENGE FOR THE BATTLE BROTHA YOU KILLED!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hfORh9cFDU8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

SPEEES MAHREEENS!

\*still in my adamantium bunker where duna used to be.\*

i launch oodles of nukes at your space marine.

adds a regular forcefeild to keep all your stuff out.

my bunker and space marine debris.

I being the idiot I am \*accidently\* cause duna to crash into kerbin which then crashes into the sun which crashes ksp

my error report

I steal it and give it to Danny2462. 

My sponsored Youtube video!

I grow bored of god games and hence stop simulating Earth / the internet / YouTube / This Thread

My Godly Computer

I bury your PC with dirt and other geological materials.

My hill

Split the earth open with the force removing the computer 

my computer
I have nearly finished overwriting every bit of data in this pathetic sector. With the help of the NaNo virus, you'll all be destroyed!
